text: Ha to Nitish, kya hi bole tumhare baare me. Tumhare jaisa banda kabhi milega nahi mujhe. Starting from the secy time, and the techmeet, it was a rollercoaster ride. I will always remember the bombay techmeet fun we had. After that coordi stuff and what not. Putting up with your bizarre ideas for club was difficult, but to last me hamesha karke dikhata that. That I liked about you, never giving up. Socha that last year me club me chill maarenge, Guwahati jaaenge techmeet me, but chill hai. Keep in touch, and aise hi apna kaam karte rehna. Kabhi milenge to bache hue treats karenge. Take care, and good lunch bro
author: Mudit  Agrawal
